amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt an agency from the provisions of the bill for actions involving a commercial transaction with a business located in a foreign country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section which specifies that the applications provided for in the bill will not affect an agency in its actions involving a commercial transaction with a business located in a foreign country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 258 (Roll no. 23).
